posts.content:
hallo,

i'm missing a piece off metal on both sides on my bus to get my floors back in.
you can see in the picture what i'm talking about,it is the ribbed part where the brake lines go true.
is there sombody who has a piece off this laying from a scrapped bus or knows where i can find that part.
i don't want to weld a flat piece in it.
henk!!!
hi , yes I have that part ill take a picture later but its the full section of the bus from the bulkhead to cab floor
